original_title: 超!! 怖い心霊ビデオ
overview: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories. A psychic video reflected in the images taken in various situations like that. A total of 8 episodes of shocking images that make you lower your eyes involuntarily.
tagline: A collection of psychic videos that everyone is sure to be scared!!
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video
